name: Igama
issues_placeholder: Faka izinkinga ezikhona nephlatfomu yakho yamanje
name_error: Sicela ufake igama lakho (okungenani izimpawu ezi-3).
telegramStatus_error: Sicela ukhethe uma unalo i-Telegram handle.

main_title:
Hlukanisa uphawu lwakho ngezixazululo zethu ezishintshashintshayo ze-white label. I-VRNL Exchange inikeza iphilosofi yokuphumelela,
ivumela ukukwazi ukuqala nokuphatha ibhizinisi lakho lokubheja kwezemidlalo kalula.
start_para: Qala uhambo lwakho namuhla ne-VRNL Exchange
experience: Thola okuhle kwe-VRNL Exchange njengoba sinikeza izinsizakalo eziphezulu kubathengi bethu
support_desp: Ku-VRNL Exchange, sinikeza ukweseka 24/7, siqinisekisa ukuthi usizo luhlala lukhona, kungakhathaliseki isikhathi.
trusted_desp: Sikhokhela ngokuhlanganyela kwezohwebo ezicacile nezichwepheshile ukuze sizuze kokubili thina nabathengi bethu.
advanced_designs_desp: >Imiklamo esezingeni eliphezulu eyenziwe ithimba lethu lobuciko, enika iphrojekthi yakho umphumela wekhwalithi ephezulu.
QA_desp: Siqinisekisa ukuthi konke kusezingeni eliphezulu futhi kuhlangabezana nezindinganiso eziphezulu ukuze sinikeze umsebenzi wekhwalithi ephezulu.
high_security_desp: >Ukuphepha kuyinto yethu ephambili. Idatha yakho kanye nolwazi kuvinjelwe futhi akuzona izinto ezizohlukumezeka.
payment_met_desp: Izinketho ezahlukene zokukhokha zitholakalayo, kufaka phakathi i-Net Banking, Ukudlulisa Imali, Paytm, Google Pay, njll ukuze kube lula kumakhasimende.
join_vrnl: Joyina i-VRNL Exchange ukuze ube nengxenye yehlelo elikhethekile elenzelwe wena.
customization_desp: I-VRNL Exchange ikhethekile ekuhlinzekeni ngezinkundla zokubheja ezithengisa izimpahla, ama-casino, kanye nezinye izixazululo ezihlukile ezithuthukisa ibhrendi yakho. Ithimba lethu luhlola yonke imininingwane, kusuka kumibono yesikhala ezobukeka kahle kuze kufike kuhlanganisa umphumela wokusebenzisa amapharamitha ngendlela ethokozisayo.
integration_desp: Ku-VRNL Exchange, siphucula izinkonzo zakho ngokuhlanganisa kusebenze ngokuhamba kwamasistimu. Ithimba lethu elizinikele liqinisekisa ukuxhumana okuphelele nezihlanganiso zomsebenzi ophezulu.
maintenance_desp: Ku-VRNL Exchange, asiyona nje isixazululo, singumlingani wakho ekusebenzeni okuhlanganyelwe. Ukusekelwa kwethu kwezihlanganiso kuqinisekisa ukuxhumana okuqhubeka nokusebenza, okwandisa ukusebenza kwethu.
ifd_desp: Ku-VRNL, sihlose ukuphakamisa izixazululo ezintsha ukuhamba phambili kokubheja kwakho kwedatha. Kusuka ezintweni zokuxhumana ebusweni benhlangano yakho kuze kube ekufinyeleleni ekuboneni izizathu eziyinqaba nezinqumo ezintsha.
explore_vrnl: Hlola i-VRNL: Ukwakhiwa Kwesikhathi Esizayo, Namuhla Naphambili.
explore_vrnl_desp: Ku-VRNL, siyinkampani ehlukile; sinobudlelwano obungakazelelwe bokusebenzisa izindlela ezihamba phambili. Siphokophela ukudala isevisi enhle yokuxhumana eyenziwa ngokuzenzakalelayo.
v_heading_desp: “Kweminye iminyaka eyi-10, inkampani yethu ibe nomsebenzi wokubheja kwemidlalo. Sihlasela lohambo kusukela ekuqaliseni kweqhinga ukuze sifike kude kokugcina okokuthokoza kokuqhubeka.”
r_heading_desp: “ Sihamba phambili ngobuchwepheshe bokucwaninga ukuze sichaze indlela ephumelelayo yokukhiqiza izinto ezintsha ezizoba ingxenye yemininingwane yakho ngesikhathi esifanele.”
n_heading_desp: “Sihlomela izinkampani nabasebenzisi ngokuhlanganisa okuthokozisayo, ukuhamba phakathi kwezinto zomsebenzi ezintsha ezimhlophe ezihambelana nge-API yakudala yebhizinisi.”
l_heading_desp: “Siqinisekisa ukuthuthukisa izinto ezithokozisayo nokufunda okwehlukile phakathi kokuba nombono ohleliwe nobuchwepheshe obuqhubeka, sinikeza okuthile okwakheke ngemuva kwezinsiza zethu.”
footer_title: Ku-VRNL, sihlola into yokudlala umphakathi. Njengomlingani ethembekile, sikhona okukufunayo; izixazululo zethu zithuthukisa isikhumbuzo esiwusizo ekuphumeleleni kobuchwepheshe.
index_maintitle1: THOLA ISIHLOKO SAKHO KWETHA MANJE KUNOKUQHUBEKA I-EXCHANGE
index_maintitle1_desp: I-VRNL EXCHANGE ikunikeza imishuwalense ehamba phambili yokubheja okufanele igcizelelwe phansi kwegama lakho.
index_maintitle2_desp: Thola imishini yokubheja emisha okuthokozisa ngaphakathi kweqhaza lamasistimu entshantshiso.
no1platform_desp: Izinkampani zizobha i-VRNL Exchange ekulindeleleni ngendlela okwazi.
instagram_desp: Thokozela okuhle kakhulu kwezemidlalo zokudlala online, umcimbi we-casino ophilayo, i-cricket, i-soccer, kanye ne-tennis konke endaweni eyodwa! Izikhumbuzo zethu zansuku zonke ziyi-ticket yakho yokujabulela izinkundla zezemidlalo ezivirtual kanye ne-floor ye-casino. Slandela thina ukuze uthole umvuzo wokushushuluza nsuku zonke!
instagram_desp2: Ku-VRNL Exchange, siyaqonda ukubaluleka kokudluliselwa kwedatha okungaphazamiseki nokuxhumana phakathi kwezinhlelo.
instagram_desp3: Isixazululo se-VRNL Exchange white label sinikeza ipulatifomu yokushintshana ephathekayo, ephelele.
instagram_desp4: Sisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obuphambili obusebenza izikhathi ezimbili ngokushesha kunezinhlelo ze-casino ezivamile.
instagram_desp5: Sinikeza amathuluzi amaningi akhelwe ukukwazi ukuphatha ipulatifomu yethu ye-casino online.
instagram_desp6: Dala i-Admin yakho ne-Downline nge-white label.
instagram_desp7: Siphumelele izindlela eziningi zokuhlanganisa ezivikelekile, zonke ezenzelwe ukusetshenziswa kalula futhi ezihloselwe ukufakwa kalula nge-API yethu ye-casino ephilayo.
instagram_desp8: >Sinikeza amaphakheji e-API, okuhlanganisa i-Live Sports Betting, i-Live Sports TV & Scorecard, i-Fancy Odds & Results kanye nezinye izici ezikhethekile.
instagram_desp9: Sinikeza amaphakheji e-API, okuhlanganisa i-Live Sports Betting, i-Betfair, i-Live Sports TV & Scorecard, i-Fancy Odds & Results kanye nezinye izici ezikhethekile.
instagram_desp10: >Futhi sinikeza i-AWC ne-Diamond Casinos ngezinketho ezithile zomphumela womdlalo kanye nezinketho zokusakaza.
instagram_desp11: Sinikeza i-white-label, i-admin, sub domain, super master, mastwe njll.
index_footer: Ku-VRNL Exchange, siphinde sibhale kabusha isipiliyoni sokudlala. Njengomlingani wakho othembekile, siletha izixazululo eziphambili, kusuka kumapulatifomu we-white-label wezemidlalo zokubheja kuya kuma-APIs aphumelelayo kanye nezindawo ze-casino ezikhangayo. Khulisa umkhiqizo wakho nge-VRNL futhi uhlale uphambili emidlalweni.
fill_form: Sicela uqedele ifomu elingezansi, sizobuya kuwe ngesikhathi esifanele.
aware: Sicela wazi ukuthi i-VRNL Exchange ayamukeli iziphakamiso zebhizinisi ezingaceliwe, kuhlanganise nezethulo zemidlalo. Noma yiziphi iziphakamiso noma izethulo zizocishwa ngaphandle kokubuyekezwa.
about_us_title: I-VRNL Exchange Ipulatifomu Eyinhloko Yezemidlalo Eziku-Internet kanye ne-Casino Betting White Label. Sihlinzeka nge-Exchange API kanye nezinye izinkonzo zesayithi lethu ezikhethekile ezase-India nase-Bangladesh ngamaphesenti aphansi futhi epulatifomu ethembekile.
betting_excitement_desp: Faka ukuthokozisa emhlabeni wezemidlalo zokubheja nge-VRNL Exchange, lapho umdlandla, isu, kanye nezehlakalo zihlangana. Iphulatifomu yethu ephephile ivumela abasebenzisi ukubikezela futhi ukubheja kumiphumela yezemidlalo, ithuthukisa isipiliyoni sokudlala. Joyina i-VRNL Exchange kwi-adventure lapho imidlalo ngayinye ingithuba yokuhlakanipha nokuphumelela.
api_integration_desp: Izinsizakalo zethu ziphumelela ngokuhlanganisa kwe-API okungaphazamiseki, okuhlanganisa ipulatifomu oyikhethayo kanye nezikhungo zebhizinisi zakho. Lokhu kuqinisekisa ukudluliselwa kalula kwedatha kanye nezinhlelo, kuthuthukisa ukusebenza kwezinhlaka eziphelele.
relationships_matter_desp: Ku-VRNL Exchange, sibeka ukubaluleka kobudlelwano. Noma ngabe phakathi kwamakhasimende, ozakwethu, noma abasebenzisi, ukuzibophezela kwethu kugxile ekwakheni izixhumanisi ezinqala. Sikholelwa ukuthi lobu budlelwano, obakhiwe ngokuthembeka nokukhululeka, buyingxenye ebalulekile empumelelweni ye-pulatifomu yethu yokushintshana.
exciting_gaming_desp: Ku-VRNL Exchange, ukudlala kuyinto ethokozisayo. Thokozela imidlalo ye-sky, i-lotus, i-world777, i-aura. Njengomuntu ogqamile, unethuba elikhulu lokuphila.
wellbeing: Sibeka izidingo zethu abantu, amakhasimende kanye ozakwethu kuqala.
games_desp: Vakashela kumalunga we-1000+ okuthokozisayo ku-VRNL Exchange. Izinketho ezibhalwe ngokwezifiso, ibhodi le-casino libonisa izinketho zezinto ezibhalwe ngokwezifiso ze-slot ne-table games.
intss_desp: Ku-VRNL Exchange, sihlinzeka ngezixazululo ezigcwele ezingavumeli izixazululo ezifaneleko zamahora kuze kube yimiphumela.
celebrated_community_desp: Ku-VRNL Exchange, sithumele ukunakekela kwecala, ukuze kunikeze izidingo zenkinga zombuso wephakeji.
serv_title_desp: VRNL Exchange inikeza izinsizakalo ezihlaza ngezokuhweba zomphakathi.
serv_title1_desp: I-VRNL Exchange inikeza ukuzijabulisa okuhlukahlukene nokubheja, kusukela ku-cricket kuya ku-casino, kuthuthukisa isipiliyoni sakho sokudlala.
cricket_desp: Hlola umdlandla we-cricket nenkampani yethu, ehlinzeka ngezinto eziphezulu zokujabulela ezithokozisayo.
soccer_desp: Ngena ku-ekselensi ye-soccer nge-VRNL Exchange - indawo yakho yezenzakalo eziphambili nemidlalo ethokozisayo.
tennis_desp: Joyina i-VRNL Exchange, umholi we-tennis ohlanganisa ubuchwepheshe kanye nobuciko. Ukwenza ngezifiso izinsizakalo ze-tennis. Thokozela i-tennis ngendlela ehlukile ne-VRNL Exchange - lapho ulwazi lihlangana nomdlandla!
casino_online_desp: Umdlandla wemidlalo ye-casino online uphinde ube yimpilo! Njengomphakeli ophambili, inkampani yethu iletha uhla oluthokozisayo lwezinto zokujabulela ze-casino ezihlela kabusha ukuzijabulisa.
virtual_games_desp: Sinikeza imidlalo ye-virtual ephakeme, kusukela kumakhilamu kuya kumathuba amasha, wonke ahlelwe ukuze kube nokujabula okukhulu.
horse_racing_desp: Izindawo zakho zokuzijabulisa zezemidlalo yezinkonyane nezinkanyezi! Njengomphakeli ophambili, inkampani yethu iletha izinkumbulo ezinzima emhlabeni wemidlalo.
greyhound_racing_desp: Imidlalo ye-greyhound iyinto esheshayo futhi ethokozisayo lapho izinja zilandela izinkomba zibhakabhaka emjikelezweni. Itholakala kubantu abaningi futhi ikhona isikhathi eside.
next_level: Izinga Elilandelayo Lokubheja kanye Nezinto Zokudlala Zecasino
next_level_desp: Siyakwamukela ku-pulatifomu yethu yokudlala ephephile, lapho umdlandla uhlangana nobungcweti. Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ungumdlali osoloko edlala noma umusha ekudlaleni, iwebhusayithi yethu elula ukuyisebenzisa inikeza uhlanganiso ohlukile wemfanelo nokujabula okuphezulu. Nge-teknoloji esesikhathini kanye nezibopho zokuba nobulungisa, sinikeza indawo ephephile yemidlalo ehlukahlukene, kusukela ku-poker kuya kubheja okuhamba phambili. Thokozela umdlandla wokuthatha izingozi futhi uhambise izikhathi zokuphumelela nokuhlangenwe nakho. Joyina thina ekuhlonzeni ukudlala kwe-inthanethi, lapho yonke i-click, ibheja, kanye ne-spin kuyindaba eyodwa esezingeni. Hamba endaweni lapho izinto eziyisimo esijwayelekile ziba yinto ehamba phambili, futhi yonke imidlalo iyindaba efanele ukusisiza. Hlola umdlandla, hlola ubuciko bokuphosa, futhi uvumele i-pulatifomu yethu ukulungisa umjikelezo wakho wokudlala. Ku-inthanethi yethu, akugcini nje ngemidlalo; kuyinto ethokozisayo ethokozisa ukusebenza kokungavumeli okudlalayo.
company_offers: Inkampani yethu inikeza izipiliyoni ze-casino ne-betting
live_casino_desp: I-Live Casinos API ihlanganisa kahle izici ze-casino ephilayo ezinkundleni zokudlala, inikeza ukufinyelela kumidlalo ye-dealer ephilayo, ukuphathwa kwe-akhawunti, nokuphathwa kwe-datha ephilayo, efana nemishuwalense yomdlalo nemininingwane ye-dealer. Siphinde sinikeze i-AWC ne-Diamond Casinos ngezinketho ezithile zomphumela womdlalo kanye nezinketho zokusakaza.
betting_exchange_desp: I-Betfair API Provider ethembekile enikeza izixazululo ezithuthukisa ze-B2B/B2C ngokuphathwa kwe-agent, ukwesekwa kwe-24/7, kanye nomlando ophumelele e-Bangladesh, ngokukhetha kwamabhizinisi amakhulu ukuthenga ikhowudi esezingeni yokuphatha ngokuphelele.
sports_bettingAPI_desp: Inikeza amaphakheji e-API, okuhlanganisa i-Live Sports Betting, i-Betfair, i-Live Sports TV & Scorecard, i-Fancy Odds & Results, i-Premium Fancy, i-Live Casinos, i-Horse Races, kanye ne-Greyhound Races, inikeza abathuthukisi ukufinyelela kumadatha wezemidlalo ephilayo, izimakethe zokubheja, ukufakwa kwezimoto, nezici ezikhethekile.
